entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning this morning and ending this afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
